name: Skinny Santa
description:
Help santa find her reindeer and lost gifts.

Use the Arrows to move. Shift to RUN and space to shoot snowballs.

Touch the reindeer to convince them to go back to Santa's sleigh. 

Touch the Gifts to pickup them. Attention to the monster and to the SnowMan.

This is my first little project in 3D made with Blender 3D, Krita and Unity.

Credits

  • Design, Developer , 2D and 3D Graphics and Sound Effects :   Mauro Rilla 
  • Music : Free assets by https://timbeek.itch.io/
